name: Magnetika
description:
By Pixellated Hammered Raccoon:

Evanski, Pixel-Team, Kenneth Burkhart of Firehammer Games

For the GMC JAM 44 (Magnetism)

Magnetika is an action puzzle game where you are a test subject that has to solve a series of puzzle rooms. Armed with the Gauss Magnetics Corporation 

Magnetic Field Manipulator Gun, 

you must use your skills as well as your wits to get to the escape platform.
